entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10 except minus 15 in low lying areas. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 10 except minus 15 in low lying areas. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning near midnight. Fog patches overnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023
